Room.Name: Fresh Water Pool
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing at the edge of a cool and placid pool of fresh water.
Room.LongDescription: The water looks dark and deep, and hardly a ripple can be seen. As you look across it, you see one spot where a bubble forms every few minutes and pops at the surface. Its the only thing disturbing the otherwise quiet pool. Trees form a canopy over the surface, and a path runs around edge of the water. Not far from here you see the top of a small brick structure.
